name: Playtime
description:
Submission for Pre-Fright Horror Game Jam 2019. Made in 4 days. 

Play make-believe with your little brother as you explore a deep dark dungeon to find the sword needed to slay the evil dragon.

Use arrow keys to move. Press Enter to interact.

[Headphones Recommended!]

______________________________________________________________________________

Credits: 

Brianna Matheson: Art/Animation/Level Design/Sound Mixing/Dialogue

Michael Lovallo: Programming/Sound Editing.

Sound Effects from: https://www.gamesounds.xyz
